I have known Rick for a few years, and have been lucky enough to work with him and watch him grow as a business professional, and ultimately into a prosperous business owner. His SEO skills are of a very high caliber and only getting better, and his business sales and negotiation skills are also impressive. Rick has a drive to succeed, and to have his clients succeed, and with the ever-growing skills at his disposal he is a formidable player in the online marketing industry, and I am happy to be working with him and not competing against him. I would recommend Rick and his company, Backspace Group, to any business needing dependable online marketing services.

April 19, 2014, Michael managed Matthew directly

I've worked with Matthew for about three years now, across two different companies, and within his field of front end website development he is by far one of the most dedicated and knowledgeable individuals I've had the opportunity to work with. He is very flexible with his role and open to accepting additional responsibility when needed, and from time to time has provided his expertise in website architecture, and even has dabbled a bit in design. Matthew is very passionate about his work and the companies/clients he works with, and I would definitely recommend him if needed.

summary: Originally from Ohio, I've been in Arizona for about 7 years, and have been lucky enough to witness and contribute to the growth of the local startup community. I am the VP of Operations with Coplex, a Phoenix based startup accelerator that focuses on helping early-stage startups with product development. I also am an organizer for 1 Million Cups.Some things I'm a fan of:Lean Development PracticesAgile MethodologiesMed & Tech StartupsPugs (yeah, that's right)
